content: behind petals on ws 12 chain-4 lps round 7 cont with b and with rs facing fold petals forward as you proceed in order to st into each chain-4 lp behind slip_stitch into next chain-4 lp chain 4 count as treble_crochet 4 treble_crochet in same lp work 5 treble_crochet in each chain-4 lp around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-4 60 treble_crochet 4 © 2024 melinda miller all rights reserved moonstone rose afghan square round 8 note in this round you will be tacking down the tips of the petals by using the bl of the half_double_crochet of round 6 to both lps of the corresponding treble_crochet of round 7 round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in same and next st tacking single_crochet in next treble_crochet as follows - insert hk first into bl of half_double_crochet of next petal and then into both lps of next treble_crochet single_crochet in next 4 treble_crochet around omitting last 2 single_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish off 60 single_crochet round 9 note pm in any tacking single_crochet skip next 2 tacking single_crochet pm in next tacking single_crochet around with a total of 4 sm this will mark all 4 corners see photo on pg 11 each corner will be worked separately round 9 join c with slip_stitch to the 3rd st before any sm tacking single_crochet skip next 2 sts trcl-corner in next tacking single_crochet with sm skip next 2 sts slip_stitch in next st finish off repeat instructions around using each consecutive sm and working 4 separate corners rm when complete 4 trcl-corners round 10 repeat the following instructions for each of the 4 corners working over the color c slip_stitch of a trcl-corner join a with slip_stitch to the same single_crochet as in round 9 skip next trcl 5 double_crochet in next chain-2 space skip next trcl single_crochet trefoil single_crochet in next chain-2 space skip next trcl 5 double_crochet in next chain-2 space skip next trcl slip_stitch over next slip_stitch finish off per corner 1 trefoil 10 double_crochet 2 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet round 11 working over the first slip_stitch before any trcl-corner as before join b with slip_stitch to the same single_crochet as in round 9 bpsc around post of next 5 double_crochet chain 3 behind trefoil bpsc around post of next 5 double_crochet chain 3 skip next unworked single_crochet on round 8 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet decrease double_crochet in next single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 3 skip next single_crochet around join with slip_stitch to first bpsc finish off 28 double_crochet 12 chain-3 40 bpsc round 12 note in this round you will be toggling sts in front of prev rnds and behind prev rnds round 12 working in front of round 11 join d with slip_stitch to the first unworked single_crochet on round 8 after any trcl-corner begpc in same st chain 8 skip next 5 double_crochet of round 11 popcorn in next unworked single_crochet on round 8 chain 5 behind
